articles.description: Canon's AI concept camera first revealed at The Photography Show 2018 is ready to hit the market (report)
articles.content: Canon is set to announce a new AI-powered camera, according to the latest reports  and it's a fascinating concept camera that Canon showed us in person at The Photography Show a few years ago (which … [+2665 chars]
